```{julia}
function serie(n)
    s = 0.0
    for i in 1:n
        s += sqrt(i)
    end
    return s
end

println("Série:")
@time serie(200_000_000)
```


```{julia}
using Base.Threads

function paralelo(n)
    local_sums = Vector{Float64}(undef, nthreads())

    # inicializar cada posição
    for i in 1:nthreads()
        local_sums[i] = 0.0
    end

    @threads for i in 1:n
        local_sums[threadid()] += sqrt(i)
    end

    return sum(local_sums)
end

@time paralelo(200_000_000)
```
